email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan window works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Can you check with the owner if they’re willing to adjust? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and they’re willing to adjust the freight rate to $49.75 per metric ton, which is a fair compromise given the current market conditions. The demurrage rate is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you, and we can proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. The adjusted freight rate is acceptable, and the demurrage rate is fine as well. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Could you send over the recap for review? Also, please confirm the laycan remains October 15-20. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Recap for Crude Oil Shipment - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, as requested, here’s the recap for the crude oil shipment: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m. Load Port: Houston, Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Cargo Size: 140,000 MT. Laycan: October 15-20. Freight Rate: $49.75 per metric ton. Demurrage: $25,000 per day, pro rata. Incoterm: CFR Rotterdam. Please review and confirm. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap for Crude Oil Shipment - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the recap looks good. We’re happy to proceed. Please confirm the fixture and share the necessary documentation. Thanks for your assistance throughout this process. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Fixture Confirmed - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news—the fixture is confirmed. I’ll send over the signed charter party and other documents shortly. Thanks for your trust and collaboration. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.
